abstract: QUERCETIN REVERSES TPA INHIBITION OF GAP JUNCTIONAL INTERCELLULAR COMMUNICATION IN RAT GLIAL CELLS
affiliation: Dept. of Pediatrics and Human Development, Michigan State University, Lansing, MI 48824
summary: Quercetin may reverse TPA action in glial cell lines dependent on gap junctional communication. It can be used as a model compound to investigate.
